backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, products, orders, commissions, payouts, referrals, and accessâ€‘controlled CRUD operations with persistent maps and counters.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON placeholder.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference or tooling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry configuring TanStack Router, authentication gating, layout, and all route components.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryStat: Reusable loading, error, and empty state UI components.
frontend/src/components/formatters/money: Utility functions formatting bigint currency and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Application layout with navigation, content container, and authenticated footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Responsive navigation bar with user menu, admin links, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal form for creating a user profile with optional referral handling and saving via mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized React Query hooks for user profiles, referrals, admin checks, products, and orders via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark mode theme variables and utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Displays an access denied message with navigation back to the dashboard for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCatalogPag: Admin interface to view, create, and edit products with access control and form dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPayoutsPag: Admin page that lists payout requests, lets admins approve or reject them, and shows pending and processed payouts.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogItemPage.tsx: Product detail page allowing authenticated users to view item info and place an order.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays product and service listings fetched from the backend, with navigation to item details and redirects when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Loads user profile, referrals, earnings, and orders to present a business overview with referral link copying.
frontend/src/pages/EarningsPage.tsx: Shows balance and commission totals and provides a filterable commission history table.
frontend/src/pages/NetworkPage.tsx: Displays network statistics and a table of downline members with their profiles and levels.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Renders a simple 404 page with a button to return home.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed information about a specific order, including product data and totals.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Displays a user's order history with product info, status, and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/PayoutsPage.tsx: Shows earnings and payout requests, allowing users to submit new withdrawal requests.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Loads and edits the user's profile information with save and cancel options.
frontend/src/pages/ReferralsPage.tsx: Shows the user's referral code and link and lists direct referrals with copy actions.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Provides an Internet Identity sign-in flow and redirects authenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/referrals.ts: Utilities for building referral links, extracting referral codes from the URL, and copying text to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, fonts, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing versions, high-level goals, implemented features, and architectural notes for the app.
